info.name: deviantART.com dAblack WIP
info.description:
##################################################################
IMPORTANT: Actual Style can be found here: http://www.deviantart.com/deviation/112429276
##################################################################

Screenshots:
http://www.deviantart.com/deviation/112429276
http://www.imagebam.com/image/a2fd2426274481/

This is my first style for Stylish, and I'm mainly doing it for myself, but i thought i might as well show it to you guys :3
As the screenie shows, it changes the light-greenish default theme of dA into a black and gray one instead, which i find much more pleasent on the eyes.
Feel free to make suggestions or ask questions, preferrably as comments on the dA submission (if you are a user there) or on the userstyles.org forum here ^^

~HKK
